question_text: Why is Bluetooth considered more suitable than Wi-Fi for connecting headsets or wearable devices?
answer_options: It uses higher bandwidth than Wi-Fi
It operates only in the 6 GHz band
It is optimized for low power and close-range connections
It requires an access point to function
correct_answer: It is optimized for low power and close-range connections
explanation: Bluetooth is well-suited for headsets and wearables due to its energy efficiency and short-range design.
